quoteText: You will not use the Service for chain letters, junk mail, spamming or any use of distribution lists to any person who has not given specific permission to be included in such a process.
title: This service prohibits users sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages

tosdr.case: This service prohibits users sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages
tosdr.tldr: The ToS state under "USER CONDUCT": "You will not use the Service for chain letters, junk mail, spamming or any use of distribution lists to any person who has not given specific permission to be included in such a process."
